name: Baloon 64
overview: Baloon 64 (spelled Balloon 64 on the title screen) is a Spanish language miscellaneous arcade style game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Khaleel Al-Ghamdi and published b6 Sintax S.A. in the Your Computer #5 compilation cassette, which was released in 1986. You play the character of a weird little alien space ship (or robot) and your goal is to collect all the balls from the bottom of the screen, and bring them to the empty black holes on the top, but make sure you don't hit the balloons or you will lose a life.
